page.title: 17PONTSTICILL BUS SERVICE
page.content: Pontsticill village three miles from Merthyr Tydfil is served by a regular public bus service.The bus leaves the terminus in Merthyr at 9.00 in the morning and thereafter every two hours on the hour.The journey to Pontsticill takes 20 minutes and the bus stops on 17 occasions for passengers to get on and off.A small group of children travelled on the 11.00 bus to sample the service provided.The bus left the terminus promptly with 19 passengers excluding ourselves;on the way 4 more passengers got on whilst 11 got off en route to Pontsticill leaving only 10 who alighted in the village itself.On the return journey 7 passengers got on in the village and one other en route; 5 passengers got off on the way leaving 6 who travelled all the way to Merthyr.
